OOC: Okay I'm just the tiniest bit annoyed now.

::Whistler::
     He opens another com on all Maximal frequencies.  "I'm sorry for 
that last comunication what I meant to say was as follows.  IF SOME 
MAXIMAL DOESN'T ACKNOWLEDGE MY EXISTANCE SOON, I WILL BE FORCED TO 
OPEN FIRE ON WHEREVER THE HELL I AM.  Thank you, have a nice day."
